duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide professional and accurate move consultations.
Follow up with the customer until they have scheduled services.
Recommend alternate services based on cost, availability, or customer specifications.
Collaborate with management and franchise partner to increase residential and commercial move revenue.
Maintain a thorough understanding of all company products, services, pricing, and promotions.
Develop strategic relationships with potential and existing customers.
Demonstrate understanding and application of effective selling strategies and techniques.
Consistently meeting and/or exceeding sales goals.
Work productively with a wide range of people and personalities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in business, management, or another related field is preferred but not required.
